Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: it is a very stylish place, a combination of an apparel boutique and a cafe. a small mezzanie in the back is fitted out with tables and chairs for the coffee drinkers. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Awesome breakfast and coffee, try it if you're in the area.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text:
Great breakfast in a cozy atmosphere. Super nice staff and delicious waffles with avocado, egg and salmon.
P.S. pita bread vs waffles option in the photo

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: This place very quickly became my favourite spot in Amsterdam. A place of quiet restful retreat, that made you feel cared for and looked after. Both coffee and cake was good. Well designed with lovely shop features, and kind friendly staff.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Love this shop, this is pretty much the only place I buy my clothes. And then I have coffee and lunch, which I recommend as well. Boyfriend & dog are also comfortable.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Initially guided here by my girlfriend seemingly unconvinced that a clothes shop would have a decent breakfast. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: A meh store taking too lightly the importance of word of mouth among their staff. For example: yesterday I sat down for a minute outside on their bench while my girlfriend checked out their products. When she was done she came outside and ‚Ä¶

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Love love love their food options! Especially if you're gluten-free, this is a definite place to grab a healthy bite! From avocado toast with pesto, to yummy pancakes for brunch on the weekends, this is definitely a unique place to eat inside a boutique!

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Bohemian chic clothing store that offers crafty jewelry and their own recently started fragrance line. The best part is you can enjoy a delicious cappuccino and waffles pre or post shopping at their loft cafe located upstairs. They also have limited outdoor seating for when the weather in Amsterdam is just right.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: SO GOOD! This is your to-go-to shop for amazingly delicious breakfast, lunch and coffee. Whether it's a Matcha Latte, an amazing Smoothie Bowl or simply a perfect cappucino, you'll feel and taste the love they put into every dish and cup.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Loved our breakfast here. We had a coconut yogurt parfait, banana bread, matcha latte, fresh made juice , avocado toast, omlette and salad. Yes we ate all of that lol. They have lots of options for people with allergies (gluten free and ‚Ä¶

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Lovely chic clothes shop, it also offers nice light meals and coffee/tea. People works here are very sweet and friendly. I also picked a stylish leather jacket here. Cool!

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Great atmosphere, very cool little shop. Staff are really friendly, it's like you're hanging out with friends. Gluten free everything and good coffee.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Delicious coffee, amazing food and the most wonderful, friendly staff. Such a lovely atmosphere and super enjoyable to browse the beautiful clothing and jewellery while sipping your coffee. Highly recommend.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Great food with gluten free options! Not so into the shop part but is nice stuff if that is your style. Very friendly staff!

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Best conceptstore in Amsterdam and best Matcha latte I've ever tasted! Great service, delicious food and you find here the most trending fashion. At Cottoncake you feel the love they put in all their products and services, worth a visit.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Cosy place! We hab lunch there it was nice! The have gluten free options on the menu like a really good granola! Go for it!

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: I love the light tones of this concept store in Amsterdam / de pijp. They present their stuff in a beautiful way too and change it regularly. You can also have a bite here: the homemade juices, couscous salads, soups and cakes are delicious and presented with an eye for detail.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: I love the gals at Cotton Cake. The clothing selection always offers something fun and chic to take home and if you don‚Äôt shop then the food and coffee is really great, healthy and feels a little bit indulgent :)

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: What a wonderful place! They have a great selection of jewellery and clothing. The staff is helpful and very nice - and if you would like to make a break of shopping you can have a very good coffee too!

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: It is 2 in 1 coffee house and clothes shop. It is quiet and relaxing inside.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: A quaint boutique + cafe combo that spins Motown, offers healthy eats, and flaunts Scandinavian design. Cafe is in the loft area towards the back, so you can admire the shop.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Service is friendly and coffee is good. More importantly the whole place is very white, which looks cool.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Delicious orange chocolate cake, vegan pecan pie... decent variety. Definitely a stop for my vegan/GF/dairy free crowd!

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Lovely place for branch and also to browse through clothes etc.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Beautiful - but pricey - clothes, but this shop is really stunning. And the breakfast foods are amazing. Definitely recommend shopping by for brunch!

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Great little cafe inside a clothing shop. Helpful staff and good gluten free options.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: i love their collections of clothing and accessories which are in light tones and sophisticated but still reasonable prices.  if you are a woman, this shop worth visit.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: The best place for gluten free food, cute clothes, great coffee, and friendly vibes.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Super cute concept store in De Pijp. Hint: the coffee and food is standout !

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Excellent food and service, guten free and vegan friendly too.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Lovely space, lovely ladies, food and coffee are excellent and made with care!

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Nice people, good Gluten free cake and good music

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Coffee 3/5, tasty food, cosy atmosphere, friendly staff.

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Love the concept and design. Food is also nice

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Thanks for being a shelter for me

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: for girl. and i am obviously not one so did not find anything that suited me !

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Good service and always something special

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: One of my fave shops!

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: Good food and nice clothes

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Concept store bohemian chic with a buardilla accommodated as a coffee. The space is spacious and bright and the staff attentive and pleasant and advises well with regard to the menu. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: (Translated by Google) A shop where you feel good, in the heart of a lively district of Amsterdam where it is good to walk. Beautiful materials, comfortable and durable clothes, and a discreet but very caring presence to help us in our ‚Ä¶

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Friends and celiac friends the CottonCake is a must visit to taste the gluten free specialties .. excellent. P.S. beautiful location to relax and go shopping ‚Ä¶

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: (Translated by Google) delicious dishes and everything always looks fantastic. nice clothes and jewelry and coffee. great tent in the pipe! ‚Ä¶

Name: Cottoncake
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Super cute cafe in a small shop. Delicious cake and coffee. The menu is very clear and there is also something for allergy sufferers and vegans. Definitely worth a visit. ‚Ä¶
